content: make a fun and fast crochet bucket hat you can wear to keep you toasty while keeping the sun out of your eyes worked in the round in chunky bernat blanket extra this plush topper is stitched in single_crochet chain and increases techniques make many in different colors for a playful gift idea for all your friends materials bernat® blanket extra™ 10 5 oz/300 g 97 yds/87 m version 1 blush pink 27034 1 ball or 39 yds/35 m version 2 velveteal 27008 1 ball or 39 yds/35 m size one size to fit adult
